name: Castle Conqueror Heroes
synopsis: Fearing the outbreak of war, the government of the Green Planet surrendered to â€œThe Empire." The new rulers then imposed heavy taxes and assumed military control, leaving the people to suffer extreme hardship under the strict regime. A revolt finally broke out, and a rebel leader named Veronica emerged in the south of the planet. Citizens freed from the yoke of the regime joined the rebel army, and the revolt grew in strength and number against The Empire. Formerly, you were a great soldier. By joining the revolt, your goal is the same as the new faction: to expel the Empire from your planet! Game Features: The great essence of Castle Conqueror combined with an all new SLG style, delivered in over 20 hours of play time. Enjoy nine chapters in this story (two modes of difficulty) as you collect items, upgrade abilities, and come across a slew of other new features awaiting your discovery!!!
